mapper.select: select uid, parentid, name, memo, sort, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from treedemo where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select uid, parentid, name, memo, sort, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from treedemo

select uid, parentid, name, memo, sort, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from treedemo
where ${value}
